examples: I need to get some sleep.
He fell asleep during the movie.

suggested: I tried to come up with a joke about sleeping, but it was a snooze fest.
Sleeping alone in a cold bed is one of the loneliest things a person can experience.
I'm so angry that my neighbor's dog won't stop barking and it's keeping me up all night. I need some sleep!
Did you know that some animals, like dolphins and birds, can sleep with only one half of their brain at a time?
The comforting smell of freshly washed sheets when you crawl into bed for a good night's sleep.
The feeling of sinking into a soft, plush mattress after a long day.
Getting enough sleep is essential for both physical and mental health. When we sleep, our body and mind are able to rest and rejuvenate, allowing us to be our best selves during the day.
